## ‚ö†Ô∏è NONCONFORMANCE DETAILS

### 1. Severity Classification

<div style="background: #F8D7DA; padding: 20px; border-left: 4px solid #8B1414; margin: 20px 0;">

**Select Severity Level:**

‚òê **üî¥ CRITICAL**
- Safety hazard
- HUD Code non-compliance  
- NTA TPIA rejection
- Product cannot be shipped
- **Action:** STOP WORK immediately

‚òê **üü° MAJOR**
- Significant quality defect
- Customer requirement not met
- Rework required
- NEC/CCR compliance issue
- **Action:** Correct before proceeding

‚òê **üü¢ MINOR**
- Cosmetic defect
- Process deviation (no impact)
- Documentation error
- **Action:** Note for improvement

</div>
